    • buy

      public DevelopmentCard buy​(int row, int column, PlayerDashboard player, PlayerTurnManager turnManager) throws EmptyDeckException
      Buy a selected card from shop, return the card to the caller and delete it from the grid
      Parameters:
      row - selected shop's row
      column - selected shop's column
      Returns:
      the first visible card from that position [row,column], after removing it from the shop
      Throws:
      EmptyDeckException

    • discardFromToken

      public void discardFromToken​(CardColour colour)
      Method to discard 2 card from the pool of card of that colour because of the solotoken
      Parameters:
      colour - the specific colour of which 2 development card have to be discarded from the shop (soloplayer)
